redirectPage.fieldDescription: Path to the page (or fully qualified URL) where user should be redirected after successful registration.
redirectPage.name: ./redirectPage

note1.fieldDescription: Configurations related to the initial view of the registration form.
note1.name: ./note1

titleView1.fieldDescription: Title to include on the initial view of the registration form.
titleView1.name: ./titleView1

includeCarousel.fieldDescription: Check this checkbox if Carousel should be included within the initial view of the Registration component.
includeCarousel.name: ./includeCarousel

emailRegistrationEnabled.fieldDescription: Check this checkbox if Email Registration should be included on the form.
emailRegistrationEnabled.name: ./emailRegistrationEnabled

listeners.selectionchanged: function(comp, value, isChecked) { var dialog = comp.findParentByType('dialog'); var textfield = dialog.getField('./emailButtonTitle');isChecked ? textfield.enable() : textfield.disable();}

emailButtonTitle.fieldDescription: Email button title for the Registration.
emailButtonTitle.name: ./emailButtonTitle

facebookRegistrationEnabled.fieldDescription: Check this checkbox if Facebook Registration should be included on the form.
facebookRegistrationEnabled.name: ./facebookRegistrationEnabled

listeners.selectionchanged: function(comp, value, isChecked) { var dialog = comp.findParentByType('dialog'); var textfield = dialog.getField('./socialFacebookButtonTitle');isChecked ? textfield.enable() : textfield.disable();}

socialFacebookButtonTitle.fieldDescription: Facebook button title for the Registration.
socialFacebookButtonTitle.name: ./socialFacebookButtonTitle

googleRegistrationEnabled.fieldDescription: Check this checkbox if Google registration should be included on the form.
googleRegistrationEnabled.name: ./googleRegistrationEnabled

listeners.selectionchanged: function(comp, value, isChecked) { var dialog = comp.findParentByType('dialog'); var textfield = dialog.getField('./socialGoogleButtonTitle');isChecked ? textfield.enable() : textfield.disable();}

socialGoogleButtonTitle.fieldDescription: Google button title for the Social registration.
socialGoogleButtonTitle.name: ./socialGoogleButtonTitle

note2.fieldDescription: Configurations related to the required fields view of the registration form.
note2.name: ./note2

titleView2.fieldDescription: Title to include on the required fields view of the registration form.
titleView2.name: ./titleView2

subtitleView2.fieldDescription:
Subtitle to include on the required fields view of the registration form when registering with social media account.
e.g.: We just need a little more...
subtitleView2.name: ./subtitleView2

requiredFieldsText.fieldDescription:
Required field indicator text. This text will explain to the user that fields marked with asterisk are required.
The required field indicator text will appear at the bottom of the form if it contains required fields.
E.g.: - required field
requiredFieldsText.name: ./requiredFieldsText

submitButtonView2.fieldDescription: Submit button title for the registration form - required fields view.
submitButtonView2.name: ./submitButtonView2

note3.fieldDescription: Configurations related to the optional fields view of the registration form.
note3.name: ./note3

titleView3.fieldDescription: Title to include on the optional fields view of the registration form.
titleView3.name: ./titleView3

submitButtonView3.fieldDescription: Submit button title for the optional fields view of the registration form.
submitButtonView3.name: ./submitButtonView3

skipLinkTitle.fieldDescription: Title of the 'skip' link on the optional fields view of the registration form.
skipLinkTitle.name: ./skipLinkTitle

included.fieldDescription: Indicates whether this field should be included on the form.
included.name: ./ageVerification/included

label.fieldDescription: Label to show next to the age verification field.
label.name: ./ageVerification/label

required.fieldDescription: Indicates whether this form field should be required.
required.name: ./ageVerification/required

requiredError.fieldDescription: Error message to show when required checkbox validation fails.
requiredError.name: ./ageVerification/requiredError

ageVerificationDialogMessage.fieldDescription:
Message to display in a popup when user clicks on 'No' option of the age verification form field.
When no value is provided, the popup will not be displayed, but user will not be able to fill out the form until 'Yes' is selected.
ageVerificationDialogMessage.name: ./ageVerification/ageVerificationDialogMessage

combineWithPrivacyAndTC.fieldDescription: When combining with Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions, the profile will include flag that user verified their age, even if the field is not found on the form.
combineWithPrivacyAndTC.fieldLabel: Combine with Privacy Policy and T&C
combineWithPrivacyAndTC.name: ./ageVerification/combineWithPrivacyAndTC

note.fieldDescription:
There is an option to include two checkboxes below the Mailing Address form fields: 'Use as Billing Address' and 'Use as Delivery Address'. When user checks the checkbox, values from Mailing Address fields will be copied to Billing Address and Delivery Address respectively.
These checkboxes will only be included, if a Mailing Address is also included and if their labels are populated below.
note.name: ./mailingAddress/note

labelUseAsBilling.fieldDescription:
Label to show next to the 'Use as Billing Address' checkbox.
If not populated, the checkbox will not be included on the form.
labelUseAsBilling.name: ./mailingAddress/labelUseAsBilling

labelUseAsDelivery.fieldDescription:
Label to show next to the 'Use as Delivery Address' checkbox.
If not populated, the checkbox will not be included on the form.
labelUseAsDelivery.name: ./mailingAddress/labelUseAsDelivery

privacyPolicyLink.fieldDescription: Path to the privacy policy page.
privacyPolicyLink.name: ./privacyAndTC/privacyPage

privacyNote.fieldDescription:
The label for 'Privacy Policy' checkbox can include a {{privacy}} placeholder that will be replaced with the Privacy Policy link.
E.g.:I agree to the {{privacy}}.
privacyNote.name: ./privacyAndTC/privacyNote

included.fieldDescription: Indicates whether this checkbox field should be included on the form.
included.name: ./privacyAndTC/privacy/included

requiredError.name: ./privacyAndTC/privacy/requiredError

checkedByDefault.fieldDescription: Indicates whether this checkbox form field should be checked by default.
checkedByDefault.name: ./privacyAndTC/privacy/checkedByDefault

termsAndConditionsLink.fieldDescription: Path to the terms and conditions page.
termsAndConditionsLink.name: ./privacyAndTC/termsAndConditionsPage

termsNote.fieldDescription:
The label for 'Terms & Conditions' checkbox can include a {{terms}} placeholder that will be replaced with the Terms & Conditions link.
E.g.:I agree to the {{terms}}.
termsNote.name: ./privacyAndTC/termsNote

included.fieldDescription: Indicates whether this checkbox field should be included on the form.
included.name: ./privacyAndTC/terms/included

label.fieldDescription: Label to show next to the checkbox.

required.fieldDescription: Indicates whether this checkbox form field should be required.
required.name: ./privacyAndTC/terms/required

requiredError.fieldDescription: Error message to show when required checkbox validation fails.
requiredError.name: ./privacyAndTC/terms/requiredError

checkedByDefault.fieldDescription: Indicates whether this checkbox form field should be checked by default.
checkedByDefault.name: ./privacyAndTC/terms/checkedByDefault

singleCheckbox.fieldDescription:
Indicates whether Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions should be combined into a single checkbox.
When checked, a single checkbox will be rendered and 'Combined checkbox' properties must be defined.
singleCheckbox.name: ./privacyAndTC/singleCheckbox

combinedNote.fieldDescription:
The label for the Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions combined checkbox can include {{privacy}} and {{terms}} placeholders that will be replaced with the Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions links respectively.
E.g.:By registering you agree to our {{privacy}} and {{terms}}.
combinedNote.name: ./privacyAndTC/combinedNote

combinedCheckbox.title: Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions combined checkbox related properties

included.fieldDescription: Indicates whether this checkbox field should be included on the form.
included.name: ./privacyAndTC/combined/included

requiredError.name: ./privacyAndTC/combined/requiredError

checkedByDefault.fieldDescription: Indicates whether this checkbox form field should be checked by default.
checkedByDefault.name: ./privacyAndTC/combined/checkedByDefault

error11820.name: ./error11820
